DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective analysis patient undergo laparoscopic incisional hernia repair . Study group : Patients incisional hernia post liver transplantation Control group : Patients incisional hernia post laparotomy upper quadrant . Primary study outcome parameter : Risk hernia recurrence . Secondary study outcome parameter : - Hernia repair-related infection rate - Postoperative morbidity Statistical analysis : Comparison study versus control group , univariate multivariate analysis , ChiÂ² Mann-Whitney-U test . P-values < 0.05 consider significant .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Incisional Hernia Repair Liver Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Incisional hernia Laparoscopic repair possible Other type ventral hernia Laparoscopy possible
